CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and Injection attacks. It directly concatenates the 'queryParams' object to the 'url' without any form of sanitization or encoding. An attacker can inject malicious scripts or commands through 'queryParams', which will be executed when the returned string is used in a context that interprets it as code or a command.
